name: Real Crazy 3D Monster Truck Run: Extreme Offroad Highway Legends- Free Racing Game
name_original: Real Crazy 3D Monster Truck Run: Extreme Offroad Highway Legends- Free Racing Game
description:
DRIVE MONSTER TRUCKS IN CRAZIEST CITY STREET !!!

Very few gamers could reach the 1 MILLION point mark - are you one of them???

AMAZING 3D Graphics which will keep you hooked!
A COOL Soundtrack to KEEP YOU GOING in this ADVENTURE of a LIFETIME!

Drive Big Foot, Monster truck Devil's Dodge, Grave Digger while escaping police trucks.
Go head to head agains the police and see how far you can run..
Crazy power up where you can ride Lamborghini power-up once in your life time!

AWESOME !
Game Features
-3D Running Game
- 4 Awesome vehicles. Drive Big Foot, Monster truck Devil's Dodge, Grave Digger while escaping police trucks.
- Crazy Super cars Power ups!
- 3rd Person Mode
- AWESOME soundtrack
Unlock Survivor Mode

DONT MISS IT!

Download this game now!
